Research & Trading


  1. Analysis of NAVs of mutual funds in the Indian Financial Market

    • Evaluated returns of different categories of mutual funds - large cap, mid cap and small cap in bull and bear phases.
    • Performed Exploratory Data Analysis on 11 macro-economic indicators (Consumer Price Index, Export & Import, S&P BSE 500 Index) to identify the ones most likely to affect Net Asset Value (NAV) of chosen funds.
    • Assessed risk and rewards associated with funds by evaluating various performance measures- Jensen’s alpha, beta, standard deviation, downside deviation, Treynor’s ratio, Sharpe ratio and Sortino’s ratio.
    • Identified highest performing mathematical model for predicting NAV values.
